projects.title: Weather Report Application
projects.description: This Weather Report Application is built using Javascript, ReactJS and Tailwind CSS for styling. It provides users with up-to-date weather information for their desired locations.

projects.title: Solar System
projects.description: This UI presents a simple visual representation of the solar system using HTML and CSS.
